attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Grok 4 by xAI showcases a new model that exemplifies the delicate balance of performance and user preferences, reflecting potential advancements in AI while also addressing issues of favoritism in development.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The introduction of LightShed technology complicates the protection of digital art by allowing easier access for AI training, escalating the ongoing battle between artists and AI developers.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: In a compelling discussion, AI journalist Karen Hao sheds light on her book, 'Empire of AI,' revealing the complex realities and ethical dilemmas within OpenAI and the broader artificial intelligence landscape.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A criminal network operating from Canada has been implicated in defrauding elderly individuals in the US out of $21 million over three years, utilizing VoIP technology to execute their schemes.
